intro: Demorchis celebica, commonly known as the Celebes orchid, is a species of orchid native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. It belongs to the Orchidaceae family and is characterized by its striking, often colorful flowers. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees in humid tropical environments. Its leaves are elongated and革质 (leathery), and it produces showy, fragrant blooms that attract pollinators. Due to habitat loss, it is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
